thread.title: RxNT Releases Enhanced ePrescribing iPhone App to Improve Prescriber Usability
thread.title_full: RxNT Releases Enhanced ePrescribing iPhone App to Improve Prescriber Usability - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: RxNT Releases Enhanced ePrescribing iPhone App to Improve Prescriber Usability
text:
RxNT, an innovative software solutions provider for the ambulatory healthcare industry announced today the launch of its enhanced, cloud-based mobile ePrescribing application. The release of this enhanced iPhone app marks the beginning of RxNT’s “new look” and focus on improving prescriber usability.
Annapolis, MD
RxNT , an innovative software solutions provider for the ambulatory healthcare industry announced today the launch of its enhanced, cloud-based mobile ePrescribing application. The release of this enhanced iPhone app marks the beginning of RxNT’s “new look” and focus on improving prescriber usability. A leader in health technology, RxNT was one of the first to build an ePrescribing application for the iPhone.
“We continually strive to improve our prescriber’s experience using our solutions,” says Tom Collinson, EVP, Business Development of RxNT. “The latest enhancements to our iPhone app (originally released on September 2, 2015) demonstrates our commitment to refining our solutions so they are the most cutting-edge, customer-centric in healthcare.”
RxNT’s updated iPhone app is iOS 9 compliant and is supported by iOS 7 and above. E-prescribing with this EPCS-certified mobile application allows physicians to realize the benefits of ePrescribing on-the-go in the same way they have been realizing the benefits of electronic prescribing at the office for over 16 years with RxNT’s cloud-based desktop solution.
RxNT’s updated iPhone ePrescribing application boasts:
 Improved look and ease of usability Improved search criteria for patient and medication search Reduced number of clicks to send a prescription electronically
RxNT’s iPhone app can be downloaded from the Apple App Store free of charge. We encourage our customers to take full advantage of the training included in the cost of the annual subscription and contact RxNT to schedule training for their providers, nurses, and staff.
About RxNT
Networking Technology, Inc. dba RxNT, based in Annapolis, MD, develops innovative software solutions for ambulatory practices. RxNT has been a leader in the cloud-based, electronic prescribing technology for over 16 years. RxNT|eRx can be used as a standalone solution or can be fully integrated into RxNT’s EHR (electronic health record) and PM (practice management) solutions. For more information about RxNT’s ePrescribing iPhone app, or its other healthcare software solutions, visit us online or call 800-943-7968 Ext. 3.
